settings.title: Description
settings.content:
Named Best Hydrating Drink Mix by Women's Health
+ Hydrating electrolyte drink mix made with organic & plant-based ingredients
+ Based on the World Health Organization’s ORS (Oral Rehydration Solution) which has been proven to hydrate as effectively as an IV drip
+ Replenishes electrolytes lost during exercise, illness, travel and alcohol consumption
+ 4x the electrolytes of leading sports drinks
+ No added sugar or artificial sweeteners
+ Made for everyone! Adults and children 1 or older

settings.title: Hydrating Electrolyte Mix
settings.chart_c1r4_label: Perfectly balanced electrolytes and plant-based ingredients
settings.chart_c2r4_label: Added sugar, low in electrolytes, and made with artificial ingredients
settings.chart_c3r4_label: Unbalanced electrolytes (low sodium, high sugar and potassium)

settings.title: Hydration is the foundation of health.
settings.content: But science shows that staying hydrated often requires more than water alone. Without essential electrolytes like sodium and potassium, we can’t replenish ourselves adequately from everyday life: exercise, travel, late nights or illness.

settings.title: That’s why we made Cure.
settings.content:
Based on the World Health Organization’s gold standard of rehydration, known as Oral Rehydration Solution, each packet contains electrolytes and glucose to facilitate rapid hydration directly into your bloodstream.

ORS is as effective as an IV drip, but way more convenient. Plus, Cure’s plant-based formula has no added sugars, just natural fruit flavors you’ll love to drink. Science has never tasted this good.

settings.title: Plant-Based Formula
settings.content: Cure’s plant-based formula has NO added sugars, just natural fruit flavors you’ll love to drink.

settings.title: Coconut Water
settings.content: Nature’s source of potassium (4x bananas and 8-10x sports drinks). Contains glucose, antioxidants, magnesium, calcium, and other nutrients.

settings.title: Pink Himalayan Salt
settings.content: Nature's natural source of sodium, which is a major electrolyte and imperative for proper hydration. Pink Himalayan Salt is premium, unrefined and contains 72 trace minerals not found in table salt.

settings.title: Non-GMO Citric Acid
settings.content: Used for added flavor and naturally found in citrus fruits. Ours is from cassava root.

settings.title: Sodium Citrate
settings.content: Sodium from citric acid. Derived from cassava root. Used for function and balanced taste.

settings.title: Organic Stevia Extract
settings.content: Plant-based, organic sweetener with no sugar or calories. Despite the common misconception, stevia is not an artificial sweetener. Used with monk fruit so that there is no bitter aftertaste.

settings.title: Monk Fruit Extract
settings.content: A vine-riped fruit native to Asia that helps round out the flavor. Used with organic stevia extract so that there is no bitter aftertaste.

settings.title: Fruit Juice Powder & Organic Flavors
settings.content: Added for taste and preference, so there is a delicious Cure flavor for everyone.

settings.title: Made with Real Ingredients. Nothing Artificial.
settings.description: Nature’s source of potassium (4x bananas and 8-10x sports drinks). Contains glucose, antioxidants, and other nutrients.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.
